channel.title: Three Partners on Simba Tango

item.title: Three Fundamentals of Tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Peter Forret Whenever I hear the postulate that everything in tango is either a step forward, a step backwards or a side step, I get a little irritated. I know what they mean, and it’s not that it is entirely wrong, it’s rather that it is incomplete, and it tends to send people off in a very step oriented direction. But I have written about that before.
